TopicTitle: Purchased game, no link has appeared?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I purchased the game 5 - 6 hours ago, I just wanted to know if their is a bug / issue why I haven't received the download link?
or does it require a developer to approve the transaction before the link comes through?
I sent an email an hour after purchase just to confirm but haven't received a reply so far.
Any news would be appreciated!

Thank you.
I have the same issue.  I'm going to give it a couple more hours before I file a claim with Paypal for suspected fraud.

The developers' offices are in Mexico and operate on Mexico time, they should be handling support requests soon. There have been a few reports lately of similar issues through the store, please send your purchase details to [email protected] so they can get you sorted.

13 hours ago, doubleshot said:

Still no resolution on this.

Please email [email protected] with your ebay receipt, Squads accounts division will be able to contact ebay on your behalf to expedite payment.
